about_the_game:
The “ NEONPIXEL - Mixed Tile Assets” consist of a diverse mix of various assets, each designed for creating distinct small to medium levels.

These include a spooky outdoor level, a wooded outdoor environment, and an abandoned garden.

The last asset is particularly well-suited for crafting a fantasy Mushroom village with an emphasis on the outdoors.
All these levels come to life with dynamic animations that lights up!

Contents:
Tilesets: 14 sheets
Animations+fx: 18sheets

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
detailed_description:
The “ NEONPIXEL - Mixed Tile Assets” consist of a diverse mix of various assets, each designed for creating distinct small to medium levels.

These include a spooky outdoor level, a wooded outdoor environment, and an abandoned garden.

The last asset is particularly well-suited for crafting a fantasy Mushroom village with an emphasis on the outdoors.
All these levels come to life with dynamic animations that lights up!

Contents:
Tilesets: 14 sheets
Animations+fx: 18sheets

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
